book.title: The Thorn Birds
book.author: Colleen McCullough
book.description: The novel is written in the genre of a family saga, the events of which cover a half-century period. A young parish priest, Ralph de Bricassar, meets a family that owns a vast Australian ranch and becomes a spiritual father for its members. At the center of the novel is the long-term love story of Ralph and Maggie Cleary, the rancher's niece. The story of a difficult and tragic choice between feelings, vocation and church career.

similarBooks.title: The Crimson Petal and the White
